title: Happy New Year!
author: JGray
text:
And here we go! The last page of Mysteries of the Arcana in the year 2015! It'll be 5 whole years before we have a year divisible by 5 people!

FIVE YEARS!

Surely that means something ominous and horrible is coming. Something evil. Something like...

... chapter 7 of Mysteries of the Arcana! I've started work on it! Of course, I already had some ideas of what I wanted to happen but now I'm working out specifics. We will get a lovely look at Mandrake's home arcana, the Moon, in chapter 7!

BTW, something was wrong with the comments, which is why some of you couldn't post any. That's been fixed and people can comment to their heart's content!

See you in 2016!

replies.author: JD
replies.text: Likely people were too busy preparing to drink, getting drunk, and now too hung over, to post.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: 'Theresa will stay here to break your pipe-cleaner arm if you get too grabby, that is."
